definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Aim To obtain the paleosalinity of the ancient Sanmen Lake.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究古三门湖的盐度数值。

sentences.english: In addition, suitable salinity environment can stimulate growth of Bareneck goby .
sentences.chinese: 适宜的盐度有利于裸项栉𫚥虎鱼的生长。

sentences.english: Computerized measuring devices called "sensors" controlled the water levels and the levels of salinity.
sentences.chinese: 被称为传感器的电脑测量装置控制了水位和含盐度。

sentences.english: Increasing salinity in the Atlantic Ocean.
The results suggested that the optimum salinities for the growth of grouper were 15~20.
sentences.chinese: 实验证明，点带石斑鱼的最适生长盐度为15～20。

sentences.english: Influence of water salinity on embryonic development of sea-slug Onchidium sp.
sentences.chinese: 盐度对石磺胚胎发育的影响。

sentences.english: They also made plans to reduce salinity and increase "environmental flows".
sentences.chinese: 他们还制订计划来降低河水含盐度和增加“环保流”。

sentences.english: In this manner the salinity is increased, since the salts stay behind.
sentences.chinese: 这样由于盐留了下来，所以盐度增大。

sentences.english: The cloud point is affected by salinity, being generally lower in more saline fluids.
sentences.chinese: 浊点受盐度影响，在含盐高的流体中浊点较低。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the suitable salinity on multiplication and growth of Bareneck goby.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索裸项栉𫚥虎鱼繁殖和育苗的适宜盐度。

sentences.english: Our Earth also has high-salinity waters, such as the Dead Sea.
sentences.chinese: 地球上也有高盐度的水域，比如死海。

sentences.english: It is initialized using observed and climatological temperature and salinity profiles.
sentences.chinese: 模式的初始化是利用观测与气候的温度与盐度场剖面。

sentences.english: It also was fitted with devices that measured salinity, temperature and oxygen concentrations in the sea water.
sentences.chinese: 它还安装有测量海水中盐度，温度和氧气浓度的设备。

sentences.english: The mixing between fluids with high- and low-salinities may existed during ore-forming.
sentences.chinese: 成矿过程中可能存在高盐度流体与低盐度流体的混合。

sentences.english: The mixing between fluids with high- and low-salinities may existed during ore-forming.
sentences.chinese: 成矿过程中可能存在高盐度流体与低盐度流体的混合。

sentences.english: The characteristics of salinity distribution are varied with the condition of flow.
sentences.chinese: 含盐度分布特征也因水流条件的不同而不同。

definition: sand content/quantity of sediment (carried by a river)
